item.title: Media Resources
item.description: I’ll be the first to admit that I’m not a frontend guy. I lack the desire to learn the latest JS frameworks and artistically speaking, I have about as much creative talent as an ironing board. So, I heavily rely on frameworks and tools to wireframe, skeleton, and otherwise fill the creative void in my projects. This is my list of tools I turn to first. I’ve broken them up into several categories based on the type of media you can get.
